original_title: Dahil Mahal Kita: The Dolzura Cortez Story
overview: Dolzura Cortez has had several men in her life. One returns to her as an AIDS researcher and unwittingly, Dolzura becomes his subject. He encouraged her to come out in public so she can dispel the social stigma that comes with the disease.
title: Dahil Mahal Kita: The Dolzura Cortez Story
